4 Types of Luck üçÄ

  • Blind Luck - Totally random, where you've absolutely no control over it.
  • Hustle Luck - This is where you put too much energy into the world, make some noise and shake things a bit, consistently. In turn, things start to happen around you.
  • Spotted Luck - You become so good in your field, with a rock solid knowledge base, that you become sensitive to luck. Either consciously or subconsciously, you find luck, or go to places where you've high probability of being lucky.
  • Magnetic Luck - Here, you become the best in your field and luck finds you. Example‚Äî Someone finds the location of a treasure chest deep into the ocean, and you happen to be a world-class scuba diver. Since they cannot extract it by themselves, they ask for your help in exchange for some percentage of treasure. So their luck becomes your luck.
